skill.name: devlog-writing
skill.desc: Writing development log entries for session handoffs and progress tracking
skill.structure:
```markdown # Summary One paragraph describing what was accomplished.
# Changes - `main/src/module/file.ext` - What changed and why - `main/src/other/file.ext:123` - Specific line reference
# Architecture Decisions Why certain approaches were chosen over alternatives.
# Open Questions Unresolved issues or decisions for next session.
# Next Steps What should happen next. ```
skill.steps: 1. Get timestamp: `date +"%Y%m%d-%H%M"` 2. Create file: `META/logs/YYYYMMDD-HHMM-description.md` 3. Write summary of work completed 4. List specific file changes with paths (relative to project root) 5. Document any architectural decisions made 6. Note open questions or blockers 7. Outline next steps for handoff
skill.when_to_write: - End of a work session - After completing a major objective or ticket - When handing off to another agent/session - When encountering a significant blocker - After making architectural decisions that need documentation
